name: Arekusandora-gō
description: The Alexandra has a similar design to most Marine vessels. It has a green hull with brown lining. It also has an individualistic brown railing not commonly found on Marine vessels. It has two large masts and one smaller that have a total of five sails. In its interior, it has a technically advanced communications room.

name: Arekusandora-gō
description: The Alexandra has a similar design to most Marine vessels. It has a green hull with brown lining. It also has an individualistic brown railing not commonly found on Marine vessels. It has two large masts and one smaller that have a total of five sails. In its interior, it has a technically advanced communications room.

name: Baratie
description: The Baratie is an ocean-going restaurant run by Zeff. It is located in the Sambas Region (サンバス海域, Sanbasu Kaiiki) of the East Blue, close to the Paradise half of the Grand Line.

name: Batoru Furankī
description: The Battle Franky is a line of special battleships built by Cutty Flam (now known as Franky), respectively named "Battle Franky" with a call number from 1 through 35. While no bigger than lifeboats, each one is heavily armed with cannons and other weaponry. Some of the ships even have armor, turrets, and various mechanical devices. This makes these small crafts as dangerous as actual battleships.

name: Bezan Burakku-gō
description: The Bezan Black is the primary ship of the Black Cat Pirates.

name: Biggu Ran'nā-gō
description: The Big Runner's appearance was somewhat similar to a fish. Its design was analogous to a jet ski, and the craft was metallic and round at the front. Yellow eyes were painted on the hull, and in the back was a small sail. There were light blue railings on the sides along with teeth on the bottom of the fish face.

name: Biggu Toppu-gō
description: Big Top is the Buggy Pirates' ship.

name: Biggu Toppu-gō
description: Big Top is the Buggy Pirates' ship.

name: Biggu Toppu Burasutā-gō
description: The Big Top Blaster is a ship belonging to the Cross Guild, having been built to act as the organization's flagship.

name: Burikingu-gō
description: The Bliking is Wapol's ship. It has the ability to go underwater, although how this is achieved is unknown. Chess would stand on top of the mast while it was submerged, making him appear as if he were walking on water.

name: Burikingu-gō
description: The Bliking is Wapol's ship. It has the ability to go underwater, although how this is achieved is unknown. Chess would stand on top of the mast while it was submerged, making him appear as if he were walking on water.

name: Buraddo Batako-gō
description: The Blood Batako was the ship of the Bluejam Pirates until its destruction.

name: Buraddo Batako-gō
description: The Blood Batako was the ship of the Bluejam Pirates until its destruction.

name: Baunti Maru
description: Bounty Maru is the ship of Yosaku and Johnny that was first introduced in a cover story.

name: Kataparuto-gō
description: The Catapult was a submarine used by Douglas Bullet.

name: Kataparuto-gō
description: The Catapult was a submarine used by Douglas Bullet.

name: Chiryaku Ten'nen Maru
description: Chiryaku Ten'nen Maru is the ship that was used by Mr. 3 and Miss Goldenweek when they were Baroque Works members.

name: Kukkingu Jōji-gō
description: The Cooking George was Zeff's ship when he was still captain of the Cook Pirates.

name: Kukkingu Jōji-gō
description: The Cooking George was Zeff's ship when he was still captain of the Cook Pirates.

name: Kyūti Wagon-gō
description: The vessel is shaped like half of a giant pink seashell. The ship could be said to resemble a seashell or a pink sleigh with a tapered front.

name: Daiaru Sen
description: A Dial Boat is a boat that uses Dials for propulsion, mainly through the use of Breath Dials. They can travel on the Milky Road quite efficiently. One notable example of a Dial Boat is Karasumaru.

name: Doreddonōto Sāberu-gō
description: The Dreadnaught Sabre was the flagship of the Krieg Pirates' armada.

name: Esukāru-gō
description: The Escar is the ship used by Rice Rice to sell Den-Den Company products.

name: Sendan
description: A Fleet (船団, Sendan) or Armada (艦隊, Kantai) is a seafaring organization that is strong or large enough to facilitate a large number of ships to support the main transportation of said organization. Not many organizations have the funds or influence to support one, but if one is able to, they can exert a lot of influence across the Blue Sea.

name: Furaingu Datchiman-gō
description: The Flying Dutchman is a legendary ship from maritime folklore, and is largely infamous as a ghost ship. It is the main vessel of the Flying Pirates and was once captained by the original Vander Decken and his descendants, up until Vander Decken IX.

name: Soratobu Gasu Fūsen
description: The Flying Gas Balloon is an airborne craft used by Caesar Clown.

name: Fūru-gō
description: The Full is a ship used by the Baroque Works organization.

name: Gōin ni Merī-gō
description: The Goin' on the Merry is Chinpy's ship.

name: Gōingu Rufi-senpai-gō
description: The Going Luffy-senpai was the Barto Club's ship. It was destroyed by Yasopp of the Red Hair Pirates.

name: Gōingu Rufi-senpai-gō
description: The Going Luffy-senpai was the Barto Club's ship. It was destroyed by Yasopp of the Red Hair Pirates.

name: Gōingu Merī-gō
description: The Going Merry was the first full-sized ship owned by the Straw Hat Pirates, a caravel that served as their main transportation through the East Blue, and the Grand Line up until Water 7. It was often affectionally referred to as simply Merry (メリー, Merī) by the crew.

name: Gōingu Merī-gō
description: The Going Merry was the first full-sized ship owned by the Straw Hat Pirates, a caravel that served as their main transportation through the East Blue, and the Grand Line up until Water 7. It was often affectionally referred to as simply Merry (メリー, Merī) by the crew.

name: Guran Tezōro
description: Gran Tesoro is a massive ship with a metropolis built on it, described as the largest entertainment city in the world. It was formerly ruled by Gild Tesoro, but after he was deposed and most of the population evacuated, Carina took command over the ship.

name: Gurēto Eirīku-gō
description: The Great Eirik is one of the giant longboats belonging to the Giant Warrior Pirates.

name: Gurōseade-gō
description: Groseade was the ship of the World Pirates.

name: Gurajji Dorufu-gō
description: Grudge Dolph is a brown ship with a voodoo doll-like figurehead with a giant nail through it. It has five cannons on its front underneath the figurehead (the center of which seems blocked by the nail) and two masts. The front mast has a black sail brandishing the crew's jolly roger, two smaller jolly roger flags on each side, a crow's nest, and a giant candle on top. The back mast has another black sail and jolly roger flag. The ship's helm is on a raised platform, which is decorated with voodoo masks. The ship's cabin is designed to look like a shack with a straw roof, and the ship has five windows on each of its sides.

name: H-1
description: The H-1 is an anime-only boat that Henzo designed.

name: Hanjōmaru
description: Hanjomaru is the Fallen Monk Pirates' ship.

name: Happōsai
description: The Happosai is the largest ship of the Happo Navy.

name: Hitsugibune
description: The Hitsugibune is a small craft used by the former Warlord, Dracule Mihawk.

name: Hitsugibune
description: The Hitsugibune is a small craft used by the former Warlord, Dracule Mihawk.

name: Ippōsai
description: The Ipposai ships are all smaller than the Happosai. They resemble Turtle Ships, with figureheads that resemble sea serpents.

name: Shima-bune
description: The Island Ship is Shiki's flying pirate ship.

name: Juerī Marugerīta-gō
description: Jewelry Margherita is the Bonney Pirates' ship.

name: Shihō-sen
description: The Judicial Ship was a traveling court that can judge a person anywhere in the world. It carried Jorge to sentence Tom to death in Enies Lobby. It was later destroyed by Spandam using the Battle Frankies as part of his plot against Tom.

name: Shihō-sen
description: The Judicial Ship was a traveling court that can judge a person anywhere in the world. It carried Jorge to sentence Tom to death in Enies Lobby. It was later destroyed by Spandam using the Battle Frankies as part of his plot against Tom.

name: Karasumaru
description: The Karasumaru is a Dial Boat owned by Conis, briefly used by the Straw Hat Pirates to explore Skypiea.

name: Kuri Maron Marin
description: The Kuri Marron Marine was a ship formerly captained by Mont Blanc Cricket.

name: Redi Merii-gō
description: The Lady Mary is an anime-only ship that Alvida and her crew tried to rob. Nami was also on this boat. The plan to loot the ship was thwarted by Luffy.

name: Riberaru Haindo-gō
description: Liberal Hind is a large red and brown ship that closely resembles a Marine Battleship, relating to X Drake's defection from the Marines. However, it is unknown if the ship belonged to him during his time with the Marines.

name: Ritoru Jeraisu-gō
description: The Little Gerais is a ship used by the Little Pirates.

name: Meruhen-gō
description: The Märchen is a ship used by Monkey D. Luffy in the first version of Romance Dawn.

name: Mazzu
description: MADS, also known as the Laboratory for Peace (平和研究所, Heiwa Kenkyūjo), was a lawless scientific research institute led by Vegapunk. It was active for thirteen years between 39–26 years ago before being shut down by the World Government.

name: Ma Ikkāda-gō
description: The Ma Ikkada was a raft used by Monkey D. Luffy and Sanji for the Donut Race in the anime.

name: Ma Ikkāda-gō
description: The Ma Ikkada was a raft used by Monkey D. Luffy and Sanji for the Donut Race in the anime.

name: Machina Hareruya-gō
description: Machina Hallelujah was a ship used by Gaimon's crew when he was a pirate.

name: Manmosu-gō
description: The Mammoth was a ship captained by Jack of the Beasts Pirates. It was destroyed by Zunesha during Jack's second attack on Zou.

name: Manmosu-gō
description: The Mammoth was a ship captained by Jack of the Beasts Pirates. It was destroyed by Zunesha during Jack's second attack on Zou.

name: Kaigun-sen
description: Marine Ships are ships that serve the Marines, acting as their transportation and means of fighting naval warfare.

name: Marubenī-gō
description: The Marubenny is a non-canon ship created as part of the Adventure of the Marubenny collaboration project and advertising campaign. Based on the general trading company Marubeni, the ship travels around the One Piece world, interacting with various locations and characters using Marubeni's technology.

name: Makushimu
description: The Ark Maxim is Enel's colossal flying ark. It was built by Gan Fall's men for Enel.

name: Migohai Gaimika-gō
description: The Migohai Gaimika was Donquixote Mjosgard's personal ship.

name: Migohai Gaimika-gō
description: The Migohai Gaimika was Donquixote Mjosgard's personal ship.

name: Mini Merī Ni-gō
description: The Mini Merry II is a small four-person shopping boat based on the Going Merry that was made by Franky. It is contained in Channel 2 of the Thousand Sunny's Soldier Dock System.

name: Misu Rabu Dakku-gō
description: The Miss Love Duck is the ship Alvida had when she was first introduced in the story.

name: Mobī Dikku-gō
description: Moby Dick was the Whitebeard Pirates' main flagship. Its name was revealed in the third databook.

name: Mobī Dikku-gō
description: Moby Dick was the Whitebeard Pirates' main flagship. Its name was revealed in the third databook.

name: Nagurufaru
description: The Naglfar is the ship of the New Giant Warrior Pirates.

name: Nasugashira-gō
description: Nasugasira is a teppanyaki ship which is part of an expansion to Baratie.

name: Nyū Wicchi Bero-gō
description: The New Witch's Tongue is the ship used by the Bellamy Pirates.

name: Nita Maria-gō
description: The Nita Maria is the smallest of Orlumbus' three ship classes. Its sails are arranged the same as the Santa Maria, with a black sail with the Jolly Roger in front, two sails in the middle, the top of which contains its name, and a sail in the back.

name: Noa
description: Noah, also known as the "Ship of Promise" (約束の舟, Yakusoku no Fune), is an enormous ship that was created during the Void Century by the denizens of Fish-Man Island. Queen Otohime and King Neptune believed the ship's purpose was for the mass migration of the island's citizens to the surface.

name: Nōsuhaimu-gō
description: The Northheim was the ship Mont Blanc Noland used to explore the Grand Line.

name: Nosutora Kasutero-gō
description: The Nostra Castello was the ship of the Fire Tank Pirates before it was destroyed by Big Mom and Prometheus in Totto Land.

name: Nosutora Kasutero-gō
description: The Nostra Castello was the ship of the Fire Tank Pirates before it was destroyed by Big Mom and Prometheus in Totto Land.

name: Numabū-gō
description: Numabou was a ship belonging to the Caribou Pirates before it was destroyed by Surume.

name: Numanshia Furamingo-gō
description: The Numancia Flamingo is the main ship of the Donquixote Pirates.

name: Numanshia Furamingo-gō
description: The Numancia Flamingo is the main ship of the Donquixote Pirates.

name: Kyakusen Ōbitto Gō
description: Orbit was a cruise ship from East Blue. Sanji was a trainee chef aboard it.

name: Kyakusen Ōbitto Gō
description: Orbit was a cruise ship from East Blue. Sanji was a trainee chef aboard it.

name: Ōro Jakuson-gō
description: The Oro Jackson was the ship built by Tom for Gol D. Roger and the Roger Pirates. It is the only known ship that has sailed to the end of the Grand Line.

name: Okkusu Beru
description: The Ox Bell is a sacred bell that is kept in the plaza of Marineford. It was originally on the ancient warship Ox Lloyd's (オックス・ロイズ号, Okkusu Roizu-gō).

name: Pafyūmu Yuda-gō
description: The Perfume Yuda is a giant red ship, resembling a Junk. The front have two Yuda harnessed, allowing them to move through the Calm Belt with ease. The ship has paddle wheels at the rear, a cabin with the architecture resembling those from ancient China, the front sail with the crew's Jolly Roger and the back sail with the kanji for "Kuja".

name: Pafyūmu Yuda-gō
description: The Perfume Yuda is a giant red ship, resembling a Junk. The front have two Yuda harnessed, allowing them to move through the Calm Belt with ease. The ship has paddle wheels at the rear, a cabin with the architecture resembling those from ancient China, the front sail with the crew's Jolly Roger and the back sail with the kanji for "Kuja".

name: Pīsu Obu Supadiru-gō
description: The Piece of Spadille was the ship used by the Spade Pirates before they were integrated into the Whitebeard Pirates.

name: Pīsu Obu Supadiru-gō
description: The Piece of Spadille was the ship used by the Spade Pirates before they were integrated into the Whitebeard Pirates.

name: Pain Pīku-gō
description: The Pine Peak is an anime-only Marine ship stationed at the G-8 Base. It attempted to capture the Going Merry, but failed.

name: Pain Pīku-gō
description: The Pine Peak is an anime-only Marine ship stationed at the G-8 Base. It attempted to capture the Going Merry, but failed.

name: Puruton
description: Pluton is one of the three Ancient Weapons, alongside Poseidon and Uranus. Pluton is a highly advanced warship capable of mass destruction, labeled the World's Worst Battleship (世界最悪の戦艦, Sekai Saiaku no Senkan). It was constructed long ago in the city of Water 7 in the Grand Line. The battleship is said to be capable of destroying whole islands in a single shot and is located deep beneath Mt. Fuji in Wano Country.

name: Pōrā Tangu-gō
description: The Polar Tang was the submarine serving as the ship of the Heart Pirates. It was broken in half and sunk during the battle between the Heart Pirates and the Blackbeard Pirates at Winner Island.

name: Pōrā Tangu-gō
description: The Polar Tang was the submarine serving as the ship of the Heart Pirates. It was broken in half and sunk during the battle between the Heart Pirates and the Blackbeard Pirates at Winner Island.

name: Pōrā Tangu-gō
description: The Polar Tang was the submarine serving as the ship of the Heart Pirates. It was broken in half and sunk during the battle between the Heart Pirates and the Blackbeard Pirates at Winner Island.

name: Pōrā Tangu-gō
description: The Polar Tang was the submarine serving as the ship of the Heart Pirates. It was broken in half and sunk during the battle between the Heart Pirates and the Blackbeard Pirates at Winner Island.

name: Kuīn Mama Shante-gō
description: Queen Mama Chanter is a ship homie belonging to the Big Mom Pirates, and the apparent flagship of their fleet.

name: Randorufu Ichiza
description: Randolph Theater is a theater troupe that debuted in Episode Special 3. The troupe was owned by Randolph before his retirement.

name: Reddo Fōsu-gō
description: The Red Force is the current ship used by the Red Hair Pirates, replacing their old ship.

name: Rokkī Pōto-gō
description: The Rocky Port is a large passenger ship formerly of a certain country that was involved in the Rocky Port Incident.

name: Rokuron Dokuron-gō
description: The Rokuron Dokuron appeared to be a red ship of average size, with green wave patterns on the sides and the top of the cabin. The front of the ship featured two skulls, one on each side, with a sun pattern around the right eyes, and the back has a half-sun symbol. Behind the main cabin was a multistory house with another building linked to it, and from the taller building's rooftop were ropes attached to the front and back sails.

name: Ryūgū-gō
description: The Ryugu is a ship from Ryugu Kingdom.

name: Sabagashira Ichi-gō
description: The Sabagashira I is a small, fish-shaped paddleboat contained in the Baratie, used for naval combat. It is usually piloted by Patty and Carne.

name: Sāberu Obu Jībekku-gō
description: The Blackbeard Pirates have at least ten ships, at least three of which (if not all) share an appearance, so the lead ship has yet to be properly identified. The ships are identified as warships, and are capable of crossing the Calm Belt.

name: Sāberu Obu Jībekku-gō
description: The Blackbeard Pirates have at least ten ships, at least three of which (if not all) share an appearance, so the lead ship has yet to be properly identified. The ships are identified as warships, and are capable of crossing the Calm Belt.

name: Jeruma Ōkoku
description: The Germa Kingdom, also known as the Kingdom of Science (科学の国, Kagaku no Kuni), is the world's only seafaring kingdom, and a former member nation of the World Government. About 300 years ago, it was the center of the Germa Empire (ジェルマ帝国, Jeruma Teikoku),, which was formed by the Vinsmoke Family's conquest of the North Blue. Today, the kingdom remains under Vinsmoke rule, and is serviced militarily as the Underworld army known as Germa 66.

name: Saramandā-go
description: The Salamander was the ship used by Gasparde Pirates. It was stolen from Elena when they ransacked the town.

name: Suna Zori
description: A Sand Sled is an anime-only ship that can travel on sand. The Barbar Pirates use those kind of ships and Rasa is the best Sand Sled navigator in the group.

name: Santa Maria-gō
description: The Santa Maria are 5 ships owned by the Yonta Maria Grand Fleet, and the middle class of their ships between the Nita Maria and the Yonta Maria.

name: Sekushī Fokushī-gō
description: The Sexy Foxy is the ship used by Foxy the Silver Fox and his Foxy Pirates. It is an enormous ship with a giant fox head at the bow. The final event of the Davy Back Fight, the combat, took place here.

name: Shāku Emeraruda-gō
description: The Shark Emeralda is the ship of the Treasure Pirates. It appeared in the Heart of Gold special.

name: Shāku Sabumāji San-gō
description: The Shark Submerge III is a deep-sea exploring submarine shaped like a shark that can carry three people. It is a part of the Thousand Sunny's Soldier Dock System and can be deployed by the number 3 channel.

name: Shāku Sabumāji San-gō
description: The Shark Submerge III is a deep-sea exploring submarine shaped like a shark that can carry three people. It is a part of the Thousand Sunny's Soldier Dock System and can be deployed by the number 3 channel.

name: Shāku Supābu-gō
description: The Shark Superb was the ship used by the Arlong Pirates.

name: Shimashima Shoppingu-gō
description: The Shimashima Shopping was a small ship personally owned by Sanji, normally stored at the Baratie. It was briefly used by Sanji, Luffy, and Yosaku to travel to the Conomi Islands—a journey it ultimately did not survive.

name: Shimashima Shoppingu-gō
description: The Shimashima Shopping was a small ship personally owned by Sanji, normally stored at the Baratie. It was briefly used by Sanji, Luffy, and Yosaku to travel to the Conomi Islands—a journey it ultimately did not survive.

name: Shiro Mokuba Ichi-gō
description: The Shiro Mokuba I is a Waver owned by Nami, originally salvaged from a shipwreck in the proximity of Jaya. After receiving many modifications (including its name) from Franky, it currently stands in Channel 1 of the Thousand Sunny's Soldier Dock system.

name: Shisutā Ankō
description: The Sister Anko is a dessert ship which is part of an expansion to Baratie. It is managed by Patty.

name: Nemureru Mori no Hakuba-gō
en_name: Sleeping White Horse of the Forest
description: The Sleeping White Horse of the Forest is a ship captained by Cavendish of the Beautiful Pirates.

name: Sunappā Heddo-gō
description: The ship has a figurehead of a fish, with flames around the neck part, while the rudder resembles a fish tail. The cabin on the middle and the back of the ship also resembles fishes. There are cannon ports on the sides of the vessel. Its overall appearance is a giant fish. The ship has five sails. The front two are dark blue, and they bear the Jolly Roger of the Sun Pirates. The middle one is dark blue, but is blank. The second one from the back is light blue. The last sail on the back is striped between blue green and green. The flag of the crew is on top of the foremost sail. After it was rebuilt, the ship had different colors on the front sail.

name: Sunappā Heddo-gō
description: The ship has a figurehead of a fish, with flames around the neck part, while the rudder resembles a fish tail. The cabin on the middle and the back of the ship also resembles fishes. There are cannon ports on the sides of the vessel. Its overall appearance is a giant fish. The ship has five sails. The front two are dark blue, and they bear the Jolly Roger of the Sun Pirates. The middle one is dark blue, but is blank. The second one from the back is light blue. The last sail on the back is striped between blue green and green. The flag of the crew is on top of the foremost sail. After it was rebuilt, the ship had different colors on the front sail.

name: Sunappā Heddo-gō
description: The ship has a figurehead of a fish, with flames around the neck part, while the rudder resembles a fish tail. The cabin on the middle and the back of the ship also resembles fishes. There are cannon ports on the sides of the vessel. Its overall appearance is a giant fish. The ship has five sails. The front two are dark blue, and they bear the Jolly Roger of the Sun Pirates. The middle one is dark blue, but is blank. The second one from the back is light blue. The last sail on the back is striped between blue green and green. The flag of the crew is on top of the foremost sail. After it was rebuilt, the ship had different colors on the front sail.

name: Supa Airando-gō
description: Spa Island was a non-canon resort ship where the Straw Hats went to take a break once they left the Florian Triangle. Doran was the owner of the ship. This was the setting of the Spa Island Arc.

name: Sento Burisu-gō
description: The St. Briss was an exploration ship that came from the Briss Kingdom.

name: Sutei Chūn-gō
description: Stay Tune is the On Air Pirates' ship.

name: Sutoraikā
description: The Striker is a raft that was used by Portgas D. Ace.

name: Suvaru
description: A Svarr, literally meaning mist-ship, is a boat that uses the buoyancy of Island Clouds to sail through the air. They are used to move around Elbaph's Sun World.

name: Kaisoku Suwanda-gō
description: The Swanda Express was a vessel crewed by Mr. 2 and his men during the Arabasta Saga.

name: Takoyaki Eito
description: Takoyaki 8 is a ship stand run by Hatchan near his home at Fish-Man Island. Built by a community of catfish, it is the home base for Hatchan's takoyaki selling business.

name: Tarierishin Gou
description: Tarielishin was the anime-only pirate ship of the Wetton Pirates before the Pumpkin Pirates stole it.

name: Tarierishin Gou
description: Tarielishin was the anime-only pirate ship of the Wetton Pirates before the Pumpkin Pirates stole it.

name: Taruto
description: The Tartes are small battleships that compose the majority of Big Mom's fleet. A number of tartes are stationed near each island in Totto Land, each 34 fleets corresponding to one of the 34 islands. Several guard the entrance to Lake Aprico on Whole Cake Island. They are sent out to investigate unauthorized or unknown ships that enter the Big Mom Pirates territory, and they have the power to shoot down any ship they believe to be dangerous or unwelcome. They are usually run by Pawn Soldiers, though in emergencies the ministers take command.

name: Tarutaigā-gō
description: The Taru Tiger is a small boat Nami, Usopp, and Robin used for the Donut Race portion of the Davy Back Fight.

name: Tarumanma-gō
description: The Tarumanma was an anime-only ship used by Tony Tony Chopper and Roronoa Zoro in the Donut Race.

name: Tarumanma-gō
description: The Tarumanma was an anime-only ship used by Tony Tony Chopper and Roronoa Zoro in the Donut Race.

name: Tecchiri Fifutī Faibu
description: The Tettiri 55 is the airship used by the Pilabuggy Villain Alliance.

name: Sauzando Gorī-gō
description: The Thousand Gorry, previously called the Maying Gorry (メーイング・ゴリー号, Mēingu Gorī-gō), is the Fischer's Pirates' ship.

name: Sauzando Sanī-gō
description: The Sunny is a brigantine-type ship designed and built by Franky, with help from Iceburg and many other master shipwrights from Galley-La. Built from Adam Wood, it is a magnificent ship of the finest craftsmanship at least double the size of the Going Merry. Its features include practically all of the various requests the Straw Hats had before arriving in Water 7.

name: Sauzando Sanī-gō
description: The Sunny is a brigantine-type ship designed and built by Franky, with help from Iceburg and many other master shipwrights from Galley-La. Built from Adam Wood, it is a magnificent ship of the finest craftsmanship at least double the size of the Going Merry. Its features include practically all of the various requests the Straw Hats had before arriving in Water 7.

name: Sauzando Sanī-gō
description: The Sunny is a brigantine-type ship designed and built by Franky, with help from Iceburg and many other master shipwrights from Galley-La. Built from Adam Wood, it is a magnificent ship of the finest craftsmanship at least double the size of the Going Merry. Its features include practically all of the various requests the Straw Hats had before arriving in Water 7.

name: Surirā Bāku
description: Thriller Bark is a giant ship formerly located on the Florian Triangle. As revealed by Brook, it used to be an island located in the West Blue, where it was built. It was converted into a pirate ship, the world's largest, and is owned by the former Warlord, Gecko Moria, serving as ship for the Thriller Bark Pirates. The ship was heavily damaged by Moria's and Kuma's attacks during the battle against the Straw Hat Pirates and after Moria's defeat, it was abandoned. Thriller Bark is the main setting of the Thriller Bark Arc, as well as the ninth island in Paradise that the Straw Hat Pirates visited.

name: Surirā Bāku
description: Thriller Bark is a giant ship formerly located on the Florian Triangle. As revealed by Brook, it used to be an island located in the West Blue, where it was built. It was converted into a pirate ship, the world's largest, and is owned by the former Warlord, Gecko Moria, serving as ship for the Thriller Bark Pirates. The ship was heavily damaged by Moria's and Kuma's attacks during the battle against the Straw Hat Pirates and after Moria's defeat, it was abandoned. Thriller Bark is the main setting of the Thriller Bark Arc, as well as the ninth island in Paradise that the Straw Hat Pirates visited.

name: Umibōzu-gō
description: The Umibozu is a submarine belonging to the Laotour Bandits.

name: Usorando-gō
description: The Usoland is the Tontatta Pirates' ship. It was built by the citizens of Dressrosa and is named after Usopp.

name: Ūtan Sonā-gō
description: Utan Sonar is Shoujou's ship, and is a large vessel with an orangutan figurehead.

name: Vikutoria Panku-gō
description: Victoria Punk was the Kid Pirates' ship. It is named after Victoria Shiruton Doruyanaika, a deceased childhood friend of Eustass Kid and Killer.

name: Vikutoria Panku-gō
description: Victoria Punk was the Kid Pirates' ship. It is named after Victoria Shiruton Doruyanaika, a deceased childhood friend of Eustass Kid and Killer.

name: Bikutorī Hantā-gō
description: The Victory Hunter is Masira's ship and main possession.

name: Weibā
description: Wavers are small vehicles created in Skypiea.

name: Webu Panikku-gō
description: The Web Panic is a large brown ship with a drill at the front. The ships black sails feature a cross bones with a symbol similar to that of her captain's rival Arlong.

name: Howaito Taigā-gō
description: The White Tiger was the Neo Marines' main ship.

name: Vinto Guranma-gō
description: Wind Granma is a ship used by Monkey D. Dragon, leader of the Revolutionary Army.

name: Yamato Maru
description: The Yamato Maru is Yamato's personal ship in One Piece School. It is one of Yamato's Secret Tools for Visiting Wano Country's Capital (ヤマトのワノ都おでかけ秘密道具, Yamato no Wano-to o Dekake Himitsu Dōgu).

name: Yonta Maria-gō
description: The Yonta Maria is the huge flagship of the Yonta Maria Grand Fleet, under the direct command of Orlumbus.

name: Zenī-gō
description: The Zenny is the anime-only ship used by the Zenny Pirates led by its captain, Zenny.
